name: Football Girls: Dream Team
description:
There are two categories of people: some of them love football more than girls and some love girls more than football.
But you don't even have to choose: in Football Girls: Dream Team you can find both beautiful girls and charming football atmosphere!

Football Girls: Dream Team is a non-standard game with simple mechanics and captivating gameplay!
  • Lots of unique levels: step by step make the girls change;
  • Go on, bro - the game becomes even more interesting from level to level!

Find out what excites you more: a football goal or a charming sporty girl
It's not so obvious ;)

The game gives you an opportunity to talk with beautiful girls from the Russian cities where the World Cup matches are held.

Chat with each girl and get to know her better - let friends envy your popularity!
Footballers, cheerleaders and just beautiful fangirls - chat with everyone and find out who is the most interesting!
